meanings.definition: A group of two people or things.
meanings.sent1: At the park, I saw two twosomes playing catch.
meanings.sent2: Twosomes often work together to solve problems.
meanings.sent3: The twosomes on the seesaw were perfectly balanced.
meanings.sent4: In nature, twosomes like birds often migrate together.
meanings.sent5: The twins were the perfect twosomes, always in sync.

meanings.sent1: The twosomes at the party danced gracefully.
meanings.sent3: The twosomes in the movie shared a romantic kiss.
meanings.sent4: The twosomes in the painting seemed to come alive.
meanings.sent5: The matching outfits made them look like a stylish twosomes.
